overview: Pleasure is not worth it unless it’s shared. For his 40th anniversary, Marc Dorcel has decided to offer you some of the most arousing debauchery scenes filmed in the course of these past 40 years. 3h30, 12 scenes and 23 actresses, here’s the chance you were dreaming of to discover or rediscover the history of the inventor of French Pornochic.
title: 40th Anniversary: Swingers
